subject: p11204646
History: Biventricular failure, to assess for congestion.
Findings: Comparison is made with a study of the area of opacification at the right base posteriorly has increased, consistent with worsening pleural effusion and underlying compressive atelectasis. Cardiac silhouette has increased in size. However, there is no convincing evidence of pulmonary vascular congestion or acute focal pneumonia.
